The first customers in the world have begun to receive their new iPhone 12 and iPhone 12 Pro in the mail, and some Apple Stores are beginning to open to customers who are venturing out to buy one of the new phones on launch day.

title: iPhone 12 launches in Australia and yep, dozens line up at Apple Store
description: COVID-19 can't kill Apple's ceremonial iPhone launches.
content:
Daniel Van Boom/CNET
Friday is worldwide iPhone 12 day, but what does an iPhone launch look like during the coronavirus pandemic? Apple's launch in Sydney, Australia showed that people are indeed still willing to line up for a new iPhone.

title: Telstra’s Insane iPhone 12 Pre-Order Offer… is Still Available
description: Apple has announced its latest phones and as it turns out Telstra's iPhone 12 pre-order offer is actually pretty damn good.
content:
Telstra’s Insane iPhone 12 Pre-Order Offer… is Still Available

title: Apple is discouraging customers from lining up for iPhone launch day
description: Apple is preparing for a potentially enormous iPhone launch day by implementing new retail formats and reservation systems to ensure safe environments for employees and customers.
content:
Reported by Business Insider, Apple is approaching the launch of the iPhone 12 and iPhone 12 Pro a lot different than any other iPhone launch in order to keep customers and employees safe.
